snippet: Richard Gasquet was dealt a setback in his bid to qualify for the season-ending ATP Finals, losing to Vasek Pospisil in the first round of the Shanghai Masters.
abstract: Vasek Pospisil beats Richard Gasquet in first round of Shanghai Masters; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Richard Gasquet was dealt a setback in his bid to qualify for the season-ending ATP Finals, losing to Vasek Pospisil in the first round of the Shanghai Masters.

headline.main: Gasquet Loses in Opener in Shanghai
